code: import React,{useState}from'react';import'../styles/ManualCourseForm.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ManualCourseForm=_ref=>{let{onSubmit}=_ref;const[courseName,setCourseName]=useState('');const[holes,setHoles]=useState(Array(18).fill({hcp:'',par:''}));const handleHoleChange=(index,field,value)=>{const newHoles=[...holes];newHoles[index]={...newHoles[index],[field]:value};setHoles(newHoles);};const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();onSubmit({courseName,holes});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{className:"manual-course-form",onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Course Name:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:courseName,onChange:e=>setCourseName(e.target.value),required:true})]}),holes.map((hole,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"hole-input",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{children:["Hole ",index+1,":"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",placeholder:"HCP",value:hole.hcp,onChange:e=>handleHoleChange(index,'hcp',e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",placeholder:"Par",value:hole.par,onChange:e=>handleHoleChange(index,'par',e.target.value),required:true})]},index)),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Add Course"})]});};export default ManualCourseForm;
